read(File) - Static method in class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadCF
 
ReadCF - Class in antiSpamFilter.validations
ReadCF - the rules file validation class

This class tests if a .cf file is a valid rules file, checking if it has only a rule between lines or a rule and a weight.

ReadLOG - Class in antiSpamFilter.validations
ReadLOG - the ham file and spam file validation class

This class tests if a .log file is a valid ham file or spam file, checking if it has at least the ID of the email .

resetWeightValue(String) - Method in class antiSpamFilter.AntiSpamFilterManualConfiguration
Resets a rule value to his original value
Rule - Class in antiSpamFilter.rules
Class Rule is the primary element in order to determine the right classification of an email as Spam or Ham.
Rule(String, double) - Constructor for class antiSpamFilter.rules.Rule
The constructor method receives two parameters in order to generate a rule.
RuleStream - Class in antiSpamFilter.rules
Class RuleStream represents a series of Rules to be used in the AntiSpam Filter in order to determine if an email must be classified as Spam or Ham.
RuleStream(File) - Constructor for class antiSpamFilter.rules.RuleStream
The constructor method creates an array of Rules to be used in the AntiSpam Filter.
